price: Ergasii isaan booda akkam akka dalagdan ilaaluuf jecha dachii keessatti bakka bu’oota isin taasifne.
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ خَلَٰٓئِفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ لِنَنظُرَ كَيۡفَ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnākum khalāifa fī al-arḍi min baʿdihim linanẓura kayfa taʿmalūna
